Class ec.ui.ButtonListLayoutManager 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class ec.ui.ButtonListLayoutManager 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ui.ButtonListLayoutManager
public class ButtonListLayoutManager
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
Class added to allow the ButtonListView class manage its own layout while avoiding a method name collision. (If you try to implement the LayOutManager interface in ButtonListView, then you get two different methods named addSubview() which is pessimal)

addSubview(View)
layoutView(View, int, int)
removeSubview(View)

addSubview 
  public void addSubview(View view)
removeSubview 
  public void removeSubview(View view)
layoutView 
  public void layoutView(View subview,
                         int deltaWidth,
                         int deltaHeight)
